urls.title: Theatre of Thought
urls.description: Werner Herzog sets his sights on yet another mysterious landscape — the human brain — for clues as to why a hunk of tissue can produce profound thoughts and feelings while considering the philosophical, ethical, and social implications of fast-advancing neural technology.

tweets.text: From bribery and corruption scandals to global politics regarding the election to host the 2022 World Cup, FIFA UNCOVERED has the tea. Now streaming on Netflix ⚽️ https://t.co/RiBf7TNIcA

So much in @netflix’s FIFA Uncovered: laying out the history, the ethos football should have, to explain the vast corruption exposed in 2015.

Sepp Blatter’s 40 year climb is a startling study of ambition; endless manoeuvrings to serve his obsession: to be ‘the boss’. https://t.co/UYopkXzDLR

urls.title: FIFA Uncovered | Official Trailer | Netflix
urls.description: From power struggles to global politics, an exploration of FIFA reveals the organization's checkered history — and what it takes to host a World Cup.SUBSCRIB...

urls.title: The Beauty of Blackness - The Shorty Awards
urls.description: The Shorty Awards honor the best content creators and producers on social media: Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Tumblr, Instagram, Snapchat and the rest of the digital world.

tweets.text:
We're thrilled to announce our @shortyawards Impact winners! "The Beauty of Blackness," a film created by @byvoxcreative & Epic Stories, w/ @sephora, @digitas & @venture_land, won in Fashion & Beauty and Racial Equality and got bronze in Branded Content.
https://t.co/7H9eUWqwnH

For decades, FIFA united the globe through football. But behind the game, craftier schemes were at play. This documentary series traces the organisation's legacy, exploring the pageantry, power struggles and politics of hosting the World Cup.

FIFA Uncovered, coming 9 Nov. https://t.co/v723x6E7lT

urls.title: Rose d’Or 2022 Shortlist Announced – Rose d'Or Awards
urls.description: The Rose d’ Or is pleased to announce that over 200 programmes from 30 countries have been selected for consideration in the final stages of Rose d’Or 2022. Mark Rowland, Chair of the Judges said “the quality of entries from across the globe gets ever higher, we’ve been presented with some very tough choices to arrive at this shortlist. Congratulations to everyone who entered and to all the fantastic productions that have reached this stage”. Jean Philip De Tender, EBU Deputy Director General/Director

urls.title: Professor Rafael Yuste and Werner Herzog's New Film Collaboration Premieres in Toronto’s Film Festival
urls.description: The movie, “Theater of Thought,” examines the mystery of the brain and the potential uses and misuses of neurotechnologies that bridge the divide between humans and computers.

tweets.text: Columbia x #TIFF22: “Theater of Thought,” a new film collaboration between biological sciences Professor @YusteRafa and director Werner Herzog exploring the potential uses and misuses of neurotechnologies, made its premiere at @TIFF_NET last week. https://t.co/7j0hmSrR6O
Thanks to the prolific Werner Herzog for coming to @thewrap studio at #tiff - his new film is “Theater of Thought” - but this legend has made 85 films in his career, so far. https://t.co/m8Gl1Wi6co

urls.title: ‘Stories Of The Stalked’ Sees Its Creator Lily Baldwin Take Listeners Around The World Through Her 13-Year Trauma
urls.description: In Stories of the Stalked, a new six-part podcast, Lily Baldwin takes listeners through her 13-year experience of being stalked by a stranger who believes they are soul mates. It all began when she was performing with David Byrne, Brian Eno and Marianne Faithfull—one of 150 dates on a world tour.

urls.description: The film follows Ugandan opposition leader, activist and musical star Bobi Wine as he takes on the regime in his country.

tweets.text: So proud of the @venture_land team, @johnbattsek, and most of all the incredible @HEBobiwine  !!!   Venice Festival: NatGeo Doc Films Acquires Worldwide Rights For ‘Bobi Wine: The People’s President’ https://t.co/9ENKTVTwrL via @Deadline

urls.title: Vox Creative wins TribecaX Award for Feature Film at the 2022 Tribeca Film Festival for ‘The Beauty of Blackness’ documentary
urls.description: The powerful documentary created in partnership with Sephora, Digitas and Ventureland, won in the Feature Film category

tweets.text: We are thrilled to announce“The Beauty of Blackness" a film created by our very own @byvoxcreative and Epic Stories with @sephora, @digitas and @venture_land  has won a #TribecaX Award in the Feature Film category at the 2022 @Tribeca Film Festival! https://t.co/R8Ewr7ew8J

Beyond proud that our film for @Sephora, “The Beauty of Blackness,” created in partnership with @byVoxCreative and @Venture_land is a #TribecaX award finalist in the Feature Film category at the 2022 @Tribeca Festival. Read here: https://t.co/mtevgSGlLG https://t.co/rDIJl22yM1
